title: 5/7崩溃，重金悬赏
author: xianjun666
txt_content: 崩溃，求原因---- Minecraft Crash Report ---- // Why did you do that?  Time: 18-8-7 下午4:28 Description: Initializing game  java.lang.RuntimeException: Duplicate stat id: replies.author: AlbertBlue
replies.txt_content:
暮色造成的,如果是进入世界就崩溃,建议
找到config文件.找到forge.cfg
把removeErroringEntities
和removeErroringTileEntities
2项都改为true
